Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:




Demon Wulf looks silently to his two brothers, then back to the pathetic 
specimen of a Cybertronian before him.  "You will speak in a clear, solid 
voice with no mistakes.  If you fail to meet these needs, you will be 
exected.  Who is your leader?  What is the name of the faction?  Where is 
your base?  What is the situation here on Past Terra?"
